Package org.nlpub.watset.util

Interface Vectors

  • public interface Vectors
    This interface contains useful vector-space model transformations from bag-of-words representations to real-valued vectors.

    • Method Summary

      Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <V> org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector transform​(java.util.Map<V,​java.lang.Number> bag)
      Transforms a bag-of-words into a real-valued vector.
      static <V> org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector transform​(java.util.Map<V,​java.lang.Number> bag, java.util.Set<V> domain)
      Transforms a bag-of-words into a real-valued vector.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        static <V> org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector transform​(java.util.Map<V,​java.lang.Number> bag)
        Transforms a bag-of-words into a real-valued vector. The number of elements in the vector is equals to the size of the key set of the given bag.
        Type Parameters:
        V - bag element class.
        Parameters:
        bag - bag-of-words.
        Returns:
        real-valued vector.

      • transform

        static <V> org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector transform​(java.util.Map<V,​java.lang.Number> bag,
                                                                java.util.Set<V> domain)
        Transforms a bag-of-words into a real-valued vector. The number of elements in the vector is equals to the size of the domain set.
        Type Parameters:
        V - bag element class.
        Parameters:
        bag - bag-of-words.
        domain - set of dimensions.
        Returns:
        real-valued vector.
